The meme suggesting that Malia Obama fou: Trump website was posted on the Facebook page associated with the website America's Last Line of Defense.
The domain name of the purported anti: Trump website, TRUMPSCREWED.US, was obtained by the same person responsible for the America's Last Line of Defense website, not by Malia Obama or anyone associated with her.
The TRUMPSCREWED: US website was found to be a duplicate of the faux NOTMYPOT.US site used in a previous hoax meme.
The America: s Last Line of Defense website, responsible for spreading political misinformation and disinformation, is part of a network of fake news sites dedicated to this purpose under the guise of offering "satire."
